title: 'Green future' and 'net zero carbon' not just fancy terms, they are commitments: PM Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasized India's commitment to achieving net zero carbon and becoming a leading producer of renewable energy. Speaking at the 4th Global Invest Renewable Energy Investors' Meet in Gandhinagar, he highlighted India's goal of becoming a developed nation by 2047 and noted that India was the first G20 nation to fulfill the Paris Agreement ahead of the 2030 deadline.
